section.p: To renounce the worship of Juntoku, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation.
The high priest warns you that if you turn your back on Juntoky, your fellow man will turn his back on you. Do you want to change your mind?

If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 40 Shards and
delete Juntoku from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet.
